text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One day, during training...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Man, I knew something was up.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's about my cleats. They felt<n>weird when I was
running earlier.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And look, they're completely worn<n>out. I'll probably have to
buy a whole<n>new pair.
choice_data_list: Goes to show how hard you've been working.
Goes to show how hard you've been working.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, reel it in a little, will you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, speaking of! You free on our next<n>day off? I want your
help picking out a<n>new pair of cleats for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Like, there's a ton of different types,<n>right? I always end up
buying the<n>same ones.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But if you're there with me, we might<n>be able to find an
even better fit for<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that was easy. Well then, guess<n>we're hitting the
streets.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days later...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I usually get everything I need from<n>the school store, so
coming to a pro<n>shop like this makes me feel like a<n>real
athlete.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Though yeesh, there really are all<n>sorts of cleats out there.
Oh man, how<n>am I supposed to pick just one?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If only we were looking to buy a<n>watermelon. Then we could
just ask<n>the old ladies running the stalls.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whiiich is where you come in, Trainer.<n>Help me find my
perfect pair, m'kay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We check out all kinds of different<n>cleats, and I explain the
pros and cons<n>of each to Nature.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks for picking them for me.<n>Can't wait to see
how they feel after I<n>break 'em in.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But I gotta say, you've really got your<n>eye on me,
don'tcha? You were<n>talking about everything, from my<n>
best running form to my habits while<n>running.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's a pro for you. I guess I was<n>just surprised, is all. In
a good way.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well, guess we should head back to<n>the academy—ah.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Having noticed something, Nature<n>walks up to a store in
front of us.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I've seen this outfit in a magazine<n>before. Wow, seeing it in
person is<n>way different.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Maybe a little too girly for me, though.<n>Hm, but the color is
right up my alley...<n>Hmmm.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, my bad! Left you hanging there,<n>Trainer. Saw an outfit I
liked, is all.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, I'm all good now. Wasn't<n>planning on buying it,
anyway.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But man, even though it looked real<n>cute in a magazine,
actually buying it is<n>a whole different story.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Like, the clothes only looked cute<n>because the model
wearing them was<n>cute, y'know?
choice_data_list: I'm sure you'd be just as cute in it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha, nice joke. Forget cute, I'd look<n>like a brute.

text_block_list.name: Store Employee
text_block_list.text: Welcome! Are you interested in trying<n>on this outfit?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh? N-nah, it wouldn't look good on<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Store Employee
text_block_list.text:
That's not true at all, miss. For this<n>outfit, if you tie up your
hair a little<n>higher, it'll look perfect on you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, I see—wait a second! I see what<n>you're doin',
employee of the month!
choice_data_list:
You will definitely be the cutest girl around in
it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Whoa! You're on her side, Trainer?!<n>Like I said, I'm... um...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right! We already bought<n>new cleats today, so I
gotta save my<n>money!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's how it is, sorry! Trainer, let'sgo already!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sigh. I almost got roped intotrying it on.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sure wasn't expecting you toteam up the store against me, Trainer.
choice_data_list: I still insist, you're gonna be the cutest in it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Y-you're still going on about that?!<n>Flattering me isn't
gonna get you<n>anywhere!
choice_data_list: I know because I'm always watching over you!
I know because I'm always watching over you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You mean during training, right?!<n>Fashion's a whole
different beast!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ughhh... Who would've thought<n>shopping for cleats could be
this<n>tiring?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though Nature is open to me picking<n>out her cleats, it looks
like picking out<n>cute clothes for her is out of the<n>question.
